Tunable.name: archetype_name
Tunable.description: The localized archetype name for this sentiment. Eg: hurt/ecstatic/glad

TunableEnum.name: duration
TunableEnum.description: The duration of this sentiment. Must be either long or short type.

TunableVariant.name: long_term_priority
TunableVariant.description: Priority for long term sentiments. Long term sentiment with higher priority will always replace existing sentiment with lower (or No) priority. Long term sentiment with lower (or No) priority will only replace existing sentiment with higher priority if existing sentiments remaining duration is shorter than the long term priority value threshold in sentiment track tracker module tuning. (NOte: 0 priority beats No priority)

TunableList.name: loot_on_proximity
TunableList.description: A list of loot actions that will be applied to the subject Sim if the subject sim comes in proximity of the target sim, and the subject sim is not in a cooldown period for the target sim. Resolver Participants: actor - sim owning the sentiment target - target of the sentiment

Tunable.description: A loot action applied to the subject Sim.

TunableTuple.name: proximity_loot_chance_weight
TunableTuple.description: The random weight for this loot to be applied when in proximity of a sim that this sim has a sentiment towards. Resolver Participants: actor - sim owning the sentiment target - target of the sentiment

Tunable.name: base_value
Tunable.description: The basic value to return if no modifications are applied.

TunableList.name: multipliers
TunableList.description: A list of multipliers to apply to base_value.

Tunable.name: multiplier
Tunable.description: The multiplier to apply to base_value if the associated tests pass.

TdescFragTag.name: tests
TdescFragTag.description: A series of tests that must pass in order for multiplier to be applied.

Tunable.name: should_proximity_loot_include_bassinet
Tunable.description: If True, we will apply the proximity loot if target sim is a bassinet. If False, we won't apply the proximity loot if target sim is a bassinet. For example, we want to set this to True on sentimentTrack_Bitter_ST_SiblingJealousy, so the sim will feel jealousy when near the bassinet baby.

TunableEnum.name: sign
TunableEnum.description: The sign of this sentiment. Must be either positive or negative type.
